.. _addresses:

Addresses
=========

The Addresses class is available in all explorers.

Usage
*****

.. code-block:: python

    from bloxplorer import bitcoin_testnet_explorer as explorer

    result = explorer.addr.get('mwog86wxZsWf6KGufzwA69xbvzE9TGZ5vA')
    print(result.data)
